name: Castle Rampage
description:
Castle Rampage is fantasy action arcade game.

You can play one of three different heroes. Your main goal is destroy five castles located in Dark Forest and beat evil Magician.

For success you will need to use your tamed dragon, own magic abilities and many secret artefacts, possesed by dark magic.

Main features:

  • Easy to learn hard to master gameplay
  • Fight for best score against your friends in online tables
  • Cartoon graphics
  • Randomly generated events
  • Five different levels
  • Crazy fantasy story
  • Unlockable bonuses and easter eggs

We are curentlly still working on this game and need some time to finish it. However we are excited to hear a feedback from you so we prepared demoversion which you can download and play now!

Demoversion (0.6.1) contains:

  • One playable character
  • Two levels
  • Implemented highscore counter
  • Showcase of main gameplay aspects

Do not be afraid of sharing your feedback on demoversion with us.
